definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Europe and Russia accounted for bulk of tobacco exports in the current year.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲和俄罗斯占本年度烟草出口的大部分。

sentences.english: The quota of immigrants for this year has already been filled.
sentences.chinese: 本年度的移民限额已满。

sentences.english: This year it expects to double its sales.
sentences.chinese: 它希望本年度这一数字能翻番。

sentences.english: No, I didn't get any subvention from Taiwan's government this year.
sentences.chinese: □否，本年度未获任何经费补助。

sentences.english: This year, Mrs Carrie Lam receives the honour of the HKIE Honorary Fellow.
sentences.chinese: 本年度获选之会员为林郑月娥女士。

sentences.english: List several ways she has blessed you this year.
sentences.chinese: 列出几件本年度她让你感到幸福的事。

sentences.english: Experts have said  Renren competitor Kaixin001 could also go public in the U.S. this year.
sentences.chinese: 专家称人人网的对手开心网本年度也将在美国上市。

sentences.english: The theme of this year's World Diabetes Day is diabetes in children and adolescents.
sentences.chinese: 本年度世界糖尿病日的主题是儿童与青少年糖尿病。

sentences.english: It is a major diplomatic activity of Chinese national leaders this year.
sentences.chinese: 这是中国国家领导人本年度一次重大外交活动。

sentences.english: The award for this year's best actress went to Mary.
sentences.chinese: 本年度最佳女演员奖的得奖者是玛丽。

sentences.english: It was a fight to the finish in this year's British Open, Padraig Harrington emerging victorious after a four-hole play-off.
sentences.chinese: 本年度英国高尔夫公开赛今天结束了最后一场比赛。

sentences.english: The president made a presentation to the businesswoman of the year.
sentences.chinese: 总统为本年度最成功的女实业家颁发了奖品。

sentences.english: Yes. The current year of sales must be reported to IRD.
sentences.chinese: 的确，本年度的销售额要上报给IRD。

sentences.english: Article 6The State Council shall prepare an annual legislation working plan at the beginning of each year.
sentences.chinese: 第六条国务院于每年年初编制本年度的立法工作计划。

sentences.english: The following is a list of 5 Internet figures in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 下面让我们回顾一下本年度网络风云人物前五名。

sentences.english: The public finances are set to go into deficit this year.
sentences.chinese: 本年度公共财政讲出现赤子。

definition: within the year/in the middle of the year/mid-year
